userjs-rcp-portlet-title: Header used for the portlet showing the changes.
userjs-rcp-portlet-empty: Message shown if there are no unpatrolled changes to show to the user.
userjs-rcp-options-origin: Label for a selector for where to get unpatrolled changes from (recent changes or watchlist).
userjs-rcp-options-quantity: Label for an input field for how many unpatrolled changes should be shown in the sidebar.
userjs-rcp-options-quantity-between: Help text for the input of how many unpatrolled changes to get.
userjs-rcp-options-frequency: Label for an input filed for how often the list of changes should refresh.
userjs-rcp-options-frequency-between: Help text for the input of how often the list should refresh.
userjs-rcp-options-newonly: Label for a checkbox for whether or not to only show new pages.
userjs-rcp-options-namespace: Label for a selector for what type of namespaces should be included in the list of unpatrolled changes.
userjs-rcp-options-namespace-content: Label for a selector to select content namespaces. What counts as a "content namespace" can vary by wiki; in Wikipedias it is typically articles and some times portals; in Wiktionaries, it is normally entries and appendices.
userjs-rcp-options-namespace-noncontent: Label for a selector to select non-content namespaces. This means all namespaces except "content namespaces".
userjs-rcp-options-namespace-all: Label for a selector to show unpatrolled changes from all namespaces.
userjs-rcp-options-direction: Label for a selector abotu which direction to show unpatrolled changes in (i.e. newest first or oldest first).
userjs-rcp-options-direction-oldest: Label for a button to select to show oldest changes first.
userjs-rcp-options-direction-newest: Label for a button to select to show newest changes first.
userjs-rcp-dialog-reset: Label for button to reset preferences to default preferences.
userjs-rcp-dialog-cancel: Label for cancel button (to close the options dialog)
userjs-rcp-error: Generic message prepended in front of an error message from the API.
userjs-rcp-indicator-new:
{{optional}}
Letter/symbol shown in front of pages that are newly created. Should probably be the same as {{msg-mw|newpageletter}}.
userjs-rcp-indicator-highlight:
{{optional}}
Letter/symbol shown in front of changes that have suspicious tags (as defined in the configuration). Should probably be the same as {{msg-mw|unpatrolledletter}}.
